Text: is to advise you that you are subject to the earnings blackout period for trading i Technologies stock that begins Friday September The blackout will continue until business days after the Q earnings release which is tentatively set for Wednesday October If the earnings release does occur on October the blackout will be through Monday October with the first day to trade on Tuesday October Please be aware that even though the blackout is tentatively scheduled to lift on October you may be subject to a trading restriction based on the Insider Trading Policy If you are in possession of any material or significant information whether positive or negative that has not been publicly disseminated you should not trade i Technologies securities until that information is publicly disseminated The i Technologies Employee Insider Trading Policy has been revised and will be sent out along with an email from Bill Beecher in the near future Thank you Robin Gunter Stock Plan Manager
